metadata.description: Glorious art and a passionate narrative by an Eisner Award-winning legend combine to form this striking and memorable graphic novel. To observers, a 54-year-old stroke victim lies silent and immobile. But in his mind, he drifts through time and space to witness a god-like figure's transformative influence on people haunted by hatred and despair. Includes new "How It Was Made" bonus material: script, page breakdowns, and more. Contains adult material.
metadata.name: Mercy
